thread.title: Will Smith stars in his first music video in a decade for Bomba Estéreo's 'Fiesta' - Music
thread.title_full: Will Smith stars in his first music video in a decade for Bomba Estéreo's 'Fiesta' - Music News - Digital Spy

author: Harry Fletcher
title: Will Smith stars in his first music video in a decade for Bomba Estéreo's 'Fiesta' - Music
text: Will Smith has appeared in his first music video in ten years for Colombian group Bomba Estéreo's track 'Fiesta'.Smith makes a show-stopping entrance in the clip, before delivering a latin-influenced rap in this unusual collaboration.The actor and musician also takes part in a warehouse rave in the larger-than-life video.Bomba Estéreo member Simon Mejia said about the track: "When I was told that Will Smith wanted to collaborate on a remix with Bomba, I couldn't believe it."This opportunity to work with Will was beyond anything we have dreamed of... It's just magic."Fans can expect more musical ventures from Smith in the near future after he told Beats 1's Zane Lowe that he has 30 new tracks recorded recently.
